website_summaries.verdict: Nice balance and a good price on this small 10-inch axe with 3 stick points.
pros: Small axe has a nice balance when thrown
Very lightweight and comfortable to use
Very sharp right out of the box
cons: The length on this axe at 10 inches is a little small

customer_reviews.title: small as hell.
customer_reviews.text: Zoom your computer screen in to 240% then look at the picture, that's the approximate size of the item you receive depending on how big your screen is, mine is 16x16
customer_reviews.author: Shock PC

customer_reviews.title: but I can say I am very pleased with this mini axe
customer_reviews.text: I normally don't do reviews , but I can say I am very pleased with this mini axe. I bought this and the SOG Fasthawk Tomahawk and I like this one better. The Mtech is very light and comfortable to use. The SOG is light as well , but it is not comfortable to the hand. For the price and what my intended use (which is to carry while hiking) the Mtech suits my purpose much better. I do like the Sog , but the Mtech wins my vote. It is a capable little axe for basic survival if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Mamas got a new toy
customer_reviews.text: As a new collector of zombie apocalypse weapons i love love love this. Quality is amazing. Color is amazing.. Very sturdy. Def going to buy another so i can have a set.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Bayou

customer_reviews.title: Great letter opener. Not much else you can use this for. Maybe pick your fingernails. .
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware. I should have figured in the small size. There is really nothing you can use this for with its lightweight size.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Haden

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than stated!
customer_reviews.text: It's more like 9" and not 10" Overall, and it' 4.25" not 5" Blade. Believe me, it needs what it is missing! Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: haven't throw it
customer_reviews.text: cool little axe...came sharp didn't find any defects even If I did I wouldn't knock stars off. It's inexpensive but cool! once I throw it a couple times Ill update if anything awful happens
customer_reviews.author: dale

customer_reviews.title: Cheap. Average quality.
customer_reviews.text: Handle fell apart on 4th throw. Just lost the screw. Inexpensive. Maybe more for young people.
customer_reviews.author: Randy W

customer_reviews.title: Works well...until it fell apart
customer_reviews.text: Great throwing axes in the first couple hours. Handle fell apart after about 2 hours on the first day of use.
customer_reviews.author: Christoph Beltz

customer_reviews.title: Useless features and a little small
customer_reviews.text: It was definitely a little small. It's also not the most comfortable to hold but not to bad. I found the small back portion of the axe head to be pretty useless. It would have been much more useful as a point. Oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan R.

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: Still really cool/nice but it's smaller than what the pictures make it out to be but the same can be said about the cereal on cereal boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Calveeno

customer_reviews.title: Smaller then what u think ...but quality is good !
customer_reviews.text: Item was smaller then what I thought..but item is a solid build..daughter has not tried out yet ..but she is excited to test it out !!
customer_reviews.author: henry kauhola

customer_reviews.title: broken handle
customer_reviews.text: the handle is broken only used once, totally waste my money.
customer_reviews.author: Ella

customer_reviews.title: Cheap steel
customer_reviews.text: Very small and cheap steel that will bend easily. Better to spend a little more on something more durable.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Chill

customer_reviews.title: tiny
customer_reviews.text: i wanted a small hawk but this thing is small!
customer_reviews.author: horse

customer_reviews.title: too cheap
customer_reviews.text: We only use these once a week for a few throws. Had about a month and one already broke. We use multiple throwing objects. These are our least fav...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great axe,  Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Great little axe! I don't understand people wanting to chop down trees with it, it is Exactly what I need. A small sharp durable little camp axe.
customer_reviews.author: 1nazarene

customer_reviews.title: Good for throwing
customer_reviews.text: This one's bitching nice and strong feels good to throw

customer_reviews.title: A joke
customer_reviews.text: Much too small to be of any use. Cheap stamped steel

customer_reviews.title: Just too small
customer_reviews.text: I liked this axe for the handle, but at only 10 inches, it is way too small to be really good for anything. It would be perfect if it was about twice as big. Will pay more for this quality

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: It came alot quicker than expected and was a great gift!

customer_reviews.title: Fl Duck review
customer_reviews.text: Item is much smaller than anticipated. Appears to be well constructed otherwise.

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice for the $ . It's very light not for any kind of work. It's a weapon.

customer_reviews.title: Great customer sevice
customer_reviews.text: Well even though my package was late. I got a personal phone call and another free apps. Great customer service and great willingness to take care of the customer. Great job metech USA. I would definitely buy more their of their products . products
customer_reviews.author: Brandon james wix

customer_reviews.title: this little thing is awesome. sharp as a razor right out the box
customer_reviews.text: this little thing is awesome. sharp as a razor right out the box. great for throwing. only con is that the handle needs to be tightened but that is an EASY fix. this is perfect if you have small branches to cut or even if you cant afford a high quality EDC knife this will do the job.
customer_reviews.author: cameron starks

product_meta.title: MTECH USA MT-602G10 Axe 10-Inch Overall
product_meta.description: The MT-602G10 Tactical Battle Axe Hatchet is a cool designed axe that can be used for many purposes. Made of 440 Stainless Steel, Full Tang with a black finish. Factory sharp. On the neck, is the MTech symbol/logo. The handles come with Black G-10 scales. There's 2 silver screw/bolts and 3 circle holes down the middle. Each comes with a Nicely designed Head Cover/Sheath. Made of black nylon with the MTech logo on the front flap in Red. There's 4 rivets for added strength. There's 2 buttons to keep the axe in securely. 1 on the flap, 1 on the upper edge. On the back there's a 1 1/4" belt loop for carrying. Their light weight and small size makes them very easy to carry around and use.
